thread.title: Drake's 'Hotline Bling' sounds much better when it's remixed with classic Nintendo 64 games - Fun
thread.title_full: Drake's 'Hotline Bling' sounds much better when it's remixed with classic Nintendo 64 games - Fun News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Drake's 'Hotline Bling' sounds much better when it's remixed with classic Nintendo 64 games - Fun
text: It only makes sense that Drake's 'Hotline Bling' sounds much better when it's mixed with classic Nintendo 64 games.After all, Drake is a heavy gamer so clearly he's making music to mash buttons to!http://setheverman.tumblr.com/post/130224964139/im-on-to-you-drakeTumblr user Seth Everman came up with the genius idea of combining 'Hotline Bling' with smooth melodic sounds from The Legend of Zelda, Mario Kart and Super Mario.Sing along with us now: "I know when Super Mario sing, that can only mean one thing!"Oooh, let's try this with 'Hold On, We're Going Home' and Sega Dreamcast games next!
